Musical Style Change, Computational Music Analysis, Digital Humanities, Music Cognition, Claude Debussy, Early 20th-Century Piano Music, Jazz Analysis, The History of Music Theory

\section{Current Employment}
%

\textbf{The University of Virginia}, Charlottesville, VA \hfill {2013--present}


\item[] {Lecturer in Critical and Comparative Studies}\\

            and a course on the analysis of Debussy's piano music.
            \end{itemize}
